agent.models.model_building_blocks.ConvBlock

class agent.models.model_building_blocks.ConvBlock(num_conv_filters, conv_kernel_size, conv_padding='valid', activation=<function relu>, max_pool=False, max_pool_kernel_size=4)

Bases: object

Convolutional block that consists of convolutional layer, batch normalization layer, and activation function.

num_conv_filters

Number of filters in the convolutional layer.

Type

int

conv_kernel_size

Height and width of the 2D convolution window.

Type

tuple

conv_padding

Padding method. “valid” by default.

Type

str

activation

Activation function. tf.nn.relu by default.

Type

function

max_pool

Whether to use max pooling layer. False by default.

Type

bool

max_pool_kernel_size

Size of the max pooling window. 4 by default.

Type

int

__init__(num_conv_filters, conv_kernel_size, conv_padding='valid', activation=<function relu>, max_pool=False, max_pool_kernel_size=4)

Initializes an instance of the ConvBlock class.

Parameters

  • num_conv_filters (int) – Number of filters in the convolutional layer.

  • conv_kernel_size (tuple) – Height and width of the 2D convolution window.

  • conv_padding (str) – Padding method. “valid” by default.

  • activation (function) – Activation function. tf.nn.relu by default.

  • max_pool (bool) – Whether to use max pooling layer. False by default.

  • max_pool_kernel_size (int) – Size of the max pooling window. 4 by default.

Methods

__init__(num_conv_filters, conv_kernel_size)

Initializes an instance of the ConvBlock class.
